mapper.select:
select ord.order_id,ord.invoice_flag,ord.order_state, inv.invoice_no,inv.invoice_id,inv.invoice_kind,inv.company_name,inv.company_address, inv.company_phone,inv.business_license_url,inv.company_tax_no,inv.invoice_content, inv.province,inv.city,inv.country,inv.address,inv.invoice_title,inv.postcode, cus.customer_name,cus.customer_phone from app_orders ord inner join app_invoice inv on ord.order_id = inv.order_id inner join app_customer cus on ord.customer_id = cus.customer_id
and ord.invoice_flag = #{invoiceFlag}
and concat(cus.customer_name,cus.customer_phone) like CONCAT('%','${phoneOrUserName}','%' )
order by ord.order_time desc

select ord.order_id,ord.order_time,ord.order_state,ord.pay_type,ord.pay_time,ord.activat_time,ord.invoice_flag,ord.pay_money, sa.airport_name, agent.name,agent.phone, cus.customer_name,cus.customer_identi,cus.customer_phone,cus.sex,cus.province_name,cus.city_name,cus.address,cus.email, cus.card_type,cus.birth_day, aoc.card_id ,aoc.card_type,aoc.init_money from app_orders ord,sys_airport sa,sys_users agent ,app_customer cus ,app_order_card aoc where ord.airport_id = sa.airport_id and ord.sale_no = agent.code and ord.customer_id = cus.customer_id and ord.order_id = aoc.order_id and ord.order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.sql: order_id, id, customer_id, order_time, order_state, pay_type, serial_id, pay_money, invoice_flag, remark1, remark2, dtflag, sale_no,airport_id,apply_type,pay_time,pay_user_id
mapper.insert: insert into app_orders (order_id, id, customer_id, order_time, order_state, pay_type, serial_id, pay_money, invoice_flag, remark1, remark2, dtflag, sale_no, airport_id ) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{invoiceFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dtflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{saleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{airportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into app_orders
order_id,
id,
customer_id,
order_time,
order_state,
pay_type,
serial_id,
pay_money,
invoice_flag,
remark1,
remark2,
dtflag,
sale_no,
airport_id,
#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{serialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{payMoney,jdbcType=REAL},

mapper.update:
update app_orders
id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
serial_id = #{serialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_money = #{payMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
invoice_flag = #{invoiceFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dtflag = #{dtflag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sale_no= #{saleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
airport_id= #{airportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pay_time= #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_user_id= #{payUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update app_orders set id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, serial_id = #{serialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_money = #{payMoney,jdbcType=REAL}, invoice_flag = #{invoiceFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dtflag = #{dtflag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sale_no= #{saleNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, airport_id= #{airportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select o.*,au.*,av.*,acb.*,ai.* from app_orders o join app_customer au on o.customer_id=au.customer_id join app_order_card ac on o.order_id=ac.order_id join app_vipcard av on ac.card_id=av.card_no left join app_card_back acb on o.order_id=acb.order_id left join app_invoice ai on o.order_id=ai.order_id WHERE o.order_id= #{orderId}
